disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 12 April to end of Tuesday 12 April GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Rain soon clearing Tuesday morning, then brighter for a while. Scattered showers developing, at times merging to give longer spells of rain. Perhaps with the odd rumble of thunder. Maximum temperature 16 °C.<br/><br/>There should also be enough air movement to prevent the build-up of local emissions. <br/><br/>Overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 13 April to end of Wednesday 13 April GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Increasingly warm with sunny spells Wednesday interspersed with cloudier periods and scattered showers.<br/><br/>There should also be enough air movement to prevent the build-up of local emissions. <br/><br/>Overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
